overview:
Nisha was Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer for AOL LLC,. Nisha has served many roles through Time Warner Inc., including Vice President of Operations, Vice President of Mergers & Acquisitions and Business Affairs.

Prior to AOL, Nisha served as Vice President, Corporate Development, at Internet company Priceline.com and worked as an investment banker at Morgan Stanley.

Nisha is a term member of the Council on Foreign Relations and from 1999-2003 served on the junior board of the Make-a-Wish Foundation of Metropolitan New York. Kumar currently serves as a director of the Human Care Charitable Trust, a hospital development in New Delhi, India.
